title: SPC ハブ
content: [[=]] [!-- This image acts as a thumbnail. --] [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/main/250_logo.png width="0" height="0"]] [[/=]] [!-- This is the header --] [[div style="text-align: center; color: #0e7dcd;"]] [[div class="unmargined"]] 警告: [[/div]] [[div class="unmargined" style="font-size: 400%; font-weight: bold; margin: 2px 0 5px;"]] 機密指定 [[/div]] [[div class="unmargined"]] 親鮫科派によるアクセスは固く禁止されています 違反者は殴打され、くすぐられ、食べられます [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="content-panel centered standalone"]] [[/div]] [!-- Top row of featured articles --] [[div class="feature-block"]] [!-- Top left feature --] [[div class="content-panel left-column"]] [[div class="panel-heading"]] 注目のSPC [[/div]] [[div class="panel-body"]] [[module listpages tags="サメ殴りセンター -jp -cn -tale" limit="1" order="random"]] [[div class="feature-title"]] %%title_linked%% [[/div]] [[div class="feature-subtitle"]] by %%created_by_linked%% [[/div]] //%%preview(150)%%// [[/module]] [[/div]] [[div class="panel-footer"]] 過去の注目SPC [[/div]] [[/div]] [!-- Top right feature --] [[div class="content-panel right-column"]] [[div class="panel-heading"]] 注目のTale [[/div]] [[div class="panel-body"]] [[module listpages tags="サメ殴りセンター +tale" limit="1" order="random"]] [[div class="feature-title"]] %%title_linked%% [[/div]] [[div class="feature-subtitle"]] by %%created_by_linked%% [[/div]] //%%preview(150)%%// [[/module]] [[/div]] [[div class="panel-footer"]] 過去の注目Tale [[/div]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [!-- Second row of features --] [[div class="feature-block"]] [[div class="content-panel left-column"]] [[div class="panel-heading"]] 注目のGoIフォーマット資料 [[/div]] [[div class="panel-body"]] [[module listpages tags="scp goi-format +サメ殴りセンター" limit="1" order="random"]] [[div class="feature-title"]] %%title_linked%% [[/div]] [[div class="feature-subtitle"]] by %%created_by_linked%% [[/div]] //%%preview(150)%%// [[/module]] [[/div]] [[div class="panel-footer"]] 過去の注目GoIフォーマット [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="content-panel right-column"]] [[div class="panel-heading"]] 史上最高のSPCページ [[/div]] [[div class="panel-body"]] [[module listpages tags="サメ殴りセンター -jp -cn" limit="1" order="random"]] [[div class="feature-title"]] %%title_linked%% [[/div]] [[div class="feature-subtitle"]] by %%created_by_linked%% [[/div]] //%%preview(150)%%// [[/module]] [[/div]] [[div class="panel-footer"]] 過去の注目イベント [[/div]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="news-block content-panel"]] [[div class="panel-heading"]] ニュース [[/div]] [[div class="panel-body"]] [!-- PLEASE LIMIT THE PAGE TO FIVE NEWS ARTICLES --] [!-- Pretty sure the five-page limit was specifically for the old template. -Quik --] [!-- Troy was here. Moose is deadly. Zyn does not approve of calling others ugly. Esko is a bear. Light's just radiant. Roget is the actual worst. Drew is the Bear Overlord. A Kaktus is a desert plant. Lurkd is hiding under your chair. Decibelle is a princess~ Silber is better than bronze. ARD is bizarre.--] [[div class="alternate unmargined"]] [[div class="news-title"]] [[module ListPages limit="1" category="*" order="updated_at desc" style="margin:0px; margin-block-start:0em;"]] %%updated_at|%Y/%m/%d%% [[/module]] [[/div]] [[div class="news-content"]] 数十年にわたる独自調査によって、サメが依然として、実際に、とても恐ろしいという長年の疑惑が、確固たるものになりました。 [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="alternate unmargined"]] [[div class="news-title"]] 1999/06/23 [[/div]] [[div class="news-content"]] 次元間データの破損により、SPCサーバーに大量の予期せぬファイルが出現しました。侵入の原因は"確保収容保護財団"であると考えられ、別世界の並行存在です。たぶん。本質的に馬鹿げたscpの性質にもかかわらず、彼らは//我々//を冗談だと考えているようです。彼らがそのことを私の//9人の死んだ祖母//に伝えるのを見てみたいです。 [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="alternate unmargined"]] [[div class="news-title"]] 1942/03/3 [[/div]] [[div class="news-content"]] 驚いた、確かにまさしくここで//たくさん//の戦いがありました。 [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="alternate unmargined"]] [[div class="news-title"]] 1893/10/12 [[/div]] [[div class="news-content"]] __速報！__サメがとても恐ろしいと明白に証明する、経験的実証が発見されました。全職員は鮫科の悪党に打って出る時、殴打行為を倍加させることが推奨されます。チョップをやつらにお見舞いしてください！オッズ・ボドキンもびっくり！ [[/div]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="panel-footer"]] 過去のニュース [[/div]] [[/div]] ---- [[div class="spc-page-block content-panel"]] [[div class="panel-heading"]] 資料 [[/div]] [[div class="panel-body"]] [[div class="spc-page-entry"]] [[module listpages tags="サメ殴りセンター -tale -joke -scp -ハブ -jp -cn" perPage="5" order="created_at desc" prependLine="[[table]]" appendLine="[[/table]]" separate="false"]] [[row class="table-alt"]][[cell style="vertical-align: top; padding: 5px 10px; border-style: solid; border-width: 0px 0px 1px 0px; border-color: #eeeee0;"]] [[div class="spc-page-title"]] %%title_linked%% [[/div]] [[div class="spc-page-description"]] %%preview(300)%% [[/div]] [[div class="spc-page-footer"]] Author(s) -- %%created_by_linked%% [[/div]] [[/cell]][[/row]] [[/module]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="panel-footer"]]   [!-- Placeholder --] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="spc-page-block content-panel"]] [[div class="panel-heading"]] Tale [[/div]] [[div class="panel-body"]] [[div class="spc-page-entry"]] [[module listpages tags="サメ殴りセンター +tale -scp -ハブ -joke" perPage="5" order="created_at desc" prependLine="[[table]]" appendLine="[[/table]]" separate="false"]] [[row class="table-alt"]][[cell style="vertical-align: top; padding: 5px 10px; border-style: solid; border-width: 0px 0px 1px 0px; border-color: #eeeee0;"]] [[div class="spc-page-title"]] %%title_linked%% [[/div]] [[div class="spc-page-description"]] %%preview(300)%% [[/div]] [[div class="spc-page-footer"]] Author(s) -- %%created_by_linked%% [[/div]] [[/cell]][[/row]] [[/module]] [[/div]] [[/div]] [[div class="panel-footer"]]   [!-- Placeholder --] [[/div]] [[/div]] ----- [[size 90%]]The SPC theme was created by PeppersGhost based on **Sigma-9** by [[user Aelanna]], and used under the Creative Commons Attribution-SharkAlike 3.0 license ([[[https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ |CC-BY-SA]]]). [[/size]] [[html]] [[/html]] @@@@ [[>]] [[module Rate]] [[/>]] @@@@ @@@@ [[=]] **[[[spc-hub-2|"わかった、でもまじめな話—SPCってなに?"]]]** [[/=]] @@@@ @@@@ @@@@ [[include :scp-jp:theme:spc]] [[module CSS]] #page-title { display: none; } .feature-block { height: 230px; } .feature-block .panel-body { height: 160px; overflow-y: hidden; } .feature-block .feature-title { font-size: 120%; font-weight: bold; } .feature-block .feature-subtitle { font-size: 90%; } .feature-block .feature-title > p, .feature-block .feature-subtitle > p { margin: 0; } .news-block .panel-body { padding: 0; } .news-block .panel-body .alternate { padding: 5px 10px; } .news-block .news-title { font-weight: bold; font-size: 110%; margin-bottom: 5px; color: #633; } .news-block .news-content { margin: 5px 0; } .news-block .news-title > p, .news-block .news-content > p { margin: 0px !important; margin-block-start: 0em !important; margin-block-end: 0em !important; } .list-pages-item p { margin: 0px !important; margin-block-start: 0px !important; margin-block-end: 0px !important; } .spc-page-block .panel-body { padding: 0; } .spc-page-entry { padding: 5px 10px; } .spc-page-entry:nth-child(even), .alternate:nth-child(even) { background-color: #fff; border-top: solid 1px #eeeee0; border-bottom: solid 1px #eeeee0; } .spc-page-entry div > p { margin: 0; } .spc-page-entry .spc-page-title { font-weight: bold; font-size: 110%; } .spc-page-entry .spc-page-title img { width: 16px; height: 11px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5); } .spc-page-entry .spc-page-description { font-size: 90%; font-style: italic; margin: 5px 20px; } .spc-page-entry { margin: 5px 0; padding: 0px 0px 5px 0px; } .spc-page-footer { font-size: #333; font-size: 80%; margin: 5px 0; } .content-panel .panel-body { background: #fff9f0 url(http://www.scp-wiki.net/local--files/component:theme/panel-bg-gradient-reverse.png) bottom repeat-x; /* box-shadow: 1px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset; */ } .spc-page-entry table tr:nth-child(even){ background-color: #fff; } [[/module]]
author: kumer1090
